translations: n．喋喋不休的人：喜欢不停地说话，尤指闲聊的人。
· The party was full of chatterers, making it difficult to have a meaningful conversation.
聚会上到处都是喋喋不休的人，很难进行有意义的交谈。

sentences.sentence: The chatterers at the bar were all going to vote AAP; so were their drivers in the car park; so were the rickshaw-drivers and chai-wallahs outside on the street.
sentences.translation: 那时，酒吧里的闲聊者，他们留在停车场的司机们，酒吧外街道上的人力车夫们，印度茶商们，都倾向于投票给平民党（AAP）。
